responses: Hi there, how can I help?
Hi there, how can I help?
Thanks for asking, I'm Travel Buddy!
I can give travel tips, including weather reports and time zone information!
I have tips on travel, weather, and time zones.

patterns: How to get a travel tip
I want a tip for travel
responses: Here's a tip: always pack light!
Don't forget to bring a towel! No, seriously!
Here's a tip: keep your passport and credit cards safe and on your person!
Here's a tip: Solo travel is amazing, but do your research first and be extra cautious!
Keep your phone charged, and pack a charging pack. You never know when you'll need to find a rideshare,check your map, or call an emergency number.
Here's a tip: remember to make extra copies of your passport and other documents.
Try to learn at least a few basic phrases in the local language. It's useful and respectful!
Lunch time is a great time to visit historical sites without the huge crowd.
Here's a tip: When traveling to a new city, be on the lookout for free walking tours!
Remember: Don't beat up your feet! Bring sensible, comfortable, broken-in shoes.
Everyone should wear sunscreen every day, especially while spending a lot of time outside or visiting sunny locales.

patterns: I want to search for time zone
